title: Ancient Jewels
features: Switch and swap your way to the top of this jewelventure!
description: Click two jewels to switch them and make a vertical line or horizontal row of 3 or more jewels of the same color to clear them and any stone slabs beneath them. Get rid of all of the stone slabs to finish each level. Special combos will get you special power-ups, which you can combine with your jewels to help you clear them.
